docblock.description: Controller handling all aspects of Portfolio objects within the system.

parse_markers.error: Argument $id is missing from the Docblock of deletePortfolio()

docblock.description: Controller handling all aspects of Portfolio objects within the system.

docblock.long-description: Creates a new Portfolio object in the system with the specified parameters. The currently logged in user is given 'owner' level permissions.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Specifies the title of the new Portfolio in plain-text (255 char max).

tag.name: param
tag.description: Describes the new Portfolio in plain-text (2^16 char max).

tag.name: param
tag.description: Specifies whether or not the Portfolio is considered private (true = private, false = public).

tag.name: return
tag.description: The created Portfolio object if successful, false otherwise.

docblock.long-description: Edits paramaters of a Portfolio object in the system that the current user has 'editing' (atleast) privileges for.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The unique identifier of the Portfolio object being edited.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The title of the Portfolio to be set, in plain-text (255 char max).

tag.name: param
tag.description: The description of the Portfolio to be set, in plain-text (2^16 char max).

tag.name: param
tag.description: Specifies whether or not the Portfolio is considered private (true = private, false = public).

tag.name: return
tag.description: True if successfully edited, false otherwise.

docblock.long-description: Deletes a Portfolio object in the system that the current user owns. Does not delete Projects or sub-Portfolios.

tag.name: parm
tag.description: int $id The unique identifier of the Portfolio to be deleted.

tag.name: return
tag.description: True if successfully deleted, false otherwise.

docblock.long-description: Retrieves a Portfolio object, constructed as specified within the Portfolio model object description.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The specified identifier of the Portfolio to be retrieved.

tag.name: return
tag.description: The Portfolio object requested if successful, false otherwise.

docblock.description: Retrieve a number of Portfolio objects the current user is a member of.
docblock.long-description: Retrieves a specified number of Portfolio objects. A User is a 'member' of a Portfolio if they have any privileges specific to them (i.e. higher than public-level access).

tag.name: param
tag.description: The number of Portfolio objects desired.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The field that the Portfolios should be ordered by (ex: date_descending), as specified in 'constants.php'.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The index of the first Portfolio to return in the set 'order_by' specifies.

tag.name: return
tag.description: An array of Portfolio objects if successful, false otherwise.

docblock.description: Retrieve a number of Portfolio objects the current User is included in.
docblock.long-description: Retrieves a specified number of Portfolio objects. A User is 'included in' a Portfolio if they have any Projects they are a 'member' of included in the Portfolio or its sub-Portfolios.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The number of Portfolio objects desired (0 = return all such Portfolios).

tag.name: param
tag.description: The field that the Portfolios should be ordered by (ex: date_descending), as specified in 'constants.php'.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The index of the first Portfolio to return in the set 'order_by' specifies.

tag.name: return
tag.description: An array of Portfolio objects if successful, false otherwise.

docblock.description: Retrieve a number of public Portfolio objects.
docblock.long-description: Retrieves a specified number of Portfolio objects. Public Portfolios are Portfolio objects with their 'private' property set to false.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The number of Portfolio objects desired (0 = return all such Portfolios).

tag.name: param
tag.description: The field that the Portfolios should be ordered by (ex: date_descending), as specified in 'constants.php'.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The index of the first Portfolio to return in the set 'order_by' specifies.

tag.name: return
tag.description: An array of Portfolio objects if successful, false otherwise.

docblock.description: Add a Portfolio as a sub-Porfolio of another Portfolio.
docblock.long-description: Adds a specific Portfolio as a 'child' to another Portfolio as its 'parent'. In the event of an attempt at a circular reference, the method will return false.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The identifier of the parent Portfolio object.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The identifier of the child sub-Portfolio object.

tag.name: return
tag.description: True if successful, false otherwise.

docblock.description: Add a Project object to a Portfolio object.
docblock.long-description: Adds a specific Project object as a 'child' to a Portfolio object as its 'parent'.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The identifier of the parent Portfolio object.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The identifier of the child Project object.

tag.name: return
tag.description: True if successful, false otherwise.

docblock.description: Remove a 'child' object from a Portfolio object.
docblock.long-description: Removes a 'child' object (a Project or sub-Portfolio) from its 'parent' object (a Portfolio).

tag.name: param
tag.description: The identifier of the parent Portfolio object.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The identifier of the child object.

tag.name: param
tag.description: A bool indicating whether a child is a sub-Portfolio or not (true = child is sub-Portfolio, false = child is not sub-Portfolio).

tag.name: return
tag.description: True if successful, false otherwise.

docblock.description: Retrieve permissions for a Group object in regards to a Portfolio object.
docblock.long-description: Gets all permissions set for a Portfolio object for a specific Group.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The identifier of the Portfolio the Group is being assigned to.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The identifier of the Group object recieving permissions for the Portfolio.

tag.name: return
tag.description: An array of all permissions the specific Group object has on the specific Portfolio object, as specified in 'constants.php'. If no permissions, returns empty array.

docblock.description: Add a permission level to a Group in regards to a Portfolio.
docblock.long-description: Appends a specified permission level to the Group's current list of permissions. The appended permission cascades down the Portfolio tree (i.e., the Group will have permission for all sub-Portfolios as well).

tag.name: param
tag.description: The identifier of the Portfolio the Group is being assigned to.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The identifier of the Group object recieving permissions for the Portfolio.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The type of permission being granted to the Group object, as specified in 'constants.php'.

tag.name: return
tag.description: True if successful, false otherwise.

docblock.description: Remove a permission from a Group in regards to a Porfolio object.
docblock.long-description: Removes a permission from a Group object associated with a Portfolio. The permission cascades down the Portfolio tree (i.e., the Group will have the permission revoked for all sub-Portfolios as well).

tag.name: param
tag.description: The identifier of the Portfolio the Group's permissions are revoked from.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The identifier of the Group object losing permissions for the Portfolio.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The type of permission being removed from the Group object, as specified in 'constants.php'.

tag.name: return
tag.description: True if successful, false otherwise.
